classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.
starting_equipment: Greataxe or any Martial Melee Weapon

level_1_features.name: Rage
level_1_features.description: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action. While raging, you gain benefits if you aren't wearing heavy armor.

level_1_features.name: Unarmored Defense
level_1_features.description: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

level_1_features.name: Weapon Mastery
level_1_features.description: Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons of your choice with which you have proficiency.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: You have learned to cast spells through your bardic performance. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your bard spells.

level_1_features.name: Bardic Inspiration
level_1_features.description: You can inspire others through stirring words or music. To do so, you use a bonus action on your turn to choose one creature other than yourself within 60 feet of you who can hear you.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.
starting_equipment: Light Crossbow and 20 Bolts or any Simple Weapon

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: As a conduit for divine power, you can cast cleric spells. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your cleric spells.

level_1_features.name: Divine Order
level_1_features.description: You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles: Protector or Thaumaturge.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.
starting_equipment: Scimitar or any Simple Melee Weapon

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: Drawing on the divine essence of nature itself, you can cast spells to shape that essence to your will. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability.

level_1_features.name: Druidic
level_1_features.description: You know Druidic, the secret language of druids. You can speak the language and use it to leave hidden messages.

level_1_features.name: Primal Order
level_1_features.description: You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles: Magician or Warden.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.
starting_equipment: Chain Mail or Leather Armor + Longbow + 20 Arrows
Martial Weapon and Shield or 2 Martial Weapons
Light Crossbow and 20 Bolts or 2 Handaxes

level_1_features.name: Fighting Style
level_1_features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one fighting style option.

level_1_features.name: Second Wind
level_1_features.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points.

level_1_features.name: Weapon Mastery
level_1_features.description: Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of three kinds of weapons of your choice.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

level_1_features.name: Martial Arts
level_1_features.description: Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons.

level_1_features.name: Unarmored Defense
level_1_features.description: While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.
starting_equipment: 6 Javelins or any Simple Melee Weapon

level_1_features.name: Lay on Hands
level_1_features.description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest.

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting (Level 2+)
level_1_features.description: By 2nd level, you have learned to draw on divine magic through meditation and prayer to cast spells as a cleric does.

level_1_features.name: Weapon Mastery
level_1_features.description: Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization.
starting_equipment: Scimitar or any Simple Melee Weapon (2)

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: You have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability.

level_1_features.name: Favored Enemy
level_1_features.description: You can add your proficiency bonus to Wisdom (Survival) checks to track a certain type of creature.

level_1_features.name: Weapon Mastery
level_1_features.description: Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

level_1_features.name: Expertise
level_1_features.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.

level_1_features.name: Sneak Attack
level_1_features.description: You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal extra damage to one creature you hit with an attack.

level_1_features.name: Thieves' Cant
level_1_features.description: You have learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation.

level_1_features.name: Weapon Mastery
level_1_features.description: Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of weapons.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.
starting_equipment: Spear or Light Crossbow and 20 Bolts

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: An event in your past left an indelible mark on you, infusing you with arcane magic. Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

level_1_features.name: Innate Sorcery
level_1_features.description: An event in your past left an indelible mark on you, infusing you with arcane magic. You can tap into this magic as a bonus action.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: Your arcane research and the magic bestowed on you by your patron have given you facility with spells. Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

level_1_features.name: Eldritch Invocations
level_1_features.description: In your study of occult lore, you have unearthed eldritch invocations, fragments of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

level_1_features.name: Spellcasting
level_1_features.description: As a student of arcane magic, you have a spellbook containing spells. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability.

level_1_features.name: Arcane Recovery
level_1_features.description: You have learned to regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook. Once per day during a short rest, you can recover spell slots.

level_1_features.name: Ritual Casting
level_1_features.description: You can cast a wizard spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell in your spellbook.
